title: I Got More Than Her Measurements
itunes:title: I Got More Than Her Measurements
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley,

I’m in my late 50s and I’m still a bachelor. I don’t have a problem meeting beautiful women and I don’t have a problem getting the cookie. I own a carpet business so I’m the person that goes to the customer’s home to do the initial meeting and get measurements. Three months ago, I went to a customer’s house and she was gorgeous....

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
